text: Caprotti is an Italian surname. Notable people include: * Arturo Caprotti (1881-1938), Italian architect and engineer who invented the Caprotti valve gear * Bernardo Caprotti (1925-2016), Italian billionaire and owner of Esselunga grocery store chain * Capriotti's, an American restaurant ==See also== * Carotti, a surname
title: Caprotti
